medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive shortness of breath, hemoptysis, and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms progressed over time, leading to a hypertensive emergency with acute heart failure. Blood pressure oscillations were noted, and respiratory distress was present.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has MEN-2a syndrome with a newly identified RET gene mutation. Previous surgeries include biadrenalectomy for bilateral pheochromocytoma and total thyroidectomy due to metastatic medullary thyroid carcinoma.
medical_history.family_history: No mutation was found in his parents and two brothers, indicating no relevant family history.
